00019 /*! \file
00020  * \brief Generic Speech Recognition API
00021  */
00022 
00023 #ifndef _ASTERISK_SPEECH_H
00024 #define _ASTERISK_SPEECH_H
00025 
00026 #if defined(__cplusplus) || defined(c_plusplus)
00027 extern "C" {
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 /* Speech structure flags */
00031 enum ast_speech_flags {
00032    AST_SPEECH_QUIET = (1 << 0), /* Quiet down output... they are talking */
00033    AST_SPEECH_SPOKE = (1 << 1), /* Speaker spoke! */
00034 };
00035 
00036 /* Speech structure states - in order of expected change */
00037 enum ast_speech_states {
00038    AST_SPEECH_STATE_NOT_READY = 0, /* Not ready to accept audio */
00039    AST_SPEECH_STATE_READY, /* Accepting audio */
00040    AST_SPEECH_STATE_WAIT, /* Wait for results to become available */
00041    AST_SPEECH_STATE_DONE, /* Processing is all done */
00042 };
00043 
00044 enum ast_speech_results_type {
00045    AST_SPEECH_RESULTS_TYPE_NORMAL = 0,
00046    AST_SPEECH_RESULTS_TYPE_NBEST,
00047 };
00048 
00049 /* Speech structure */
00050 struct ast_speech {
00051    /*! Structure lock */
00052    ast_mutex_t lock;
00053    /*! Set flags */
00054    unsigned int flags;
00055    /*! Processing sound (used when engine is processing audio and getting results) */
00056    char *processing_sound;
00057    /*! Current state of structure */
00058    int state;
00059    /*! Expected write format */
00060    int format;
00061    /*! Data for speech engine */
00062    void *data;
00063    /*! Cached results */
00064    struct ast_speech_result *results;
00065    /*! Type of results we want */
00066    enum ast_speech_results_type results_type;
00067    /*! Pointer to the engine used by this speech structure */
00068    struct ast_speech_engine *engine;
00069 };
00070   
00071 /* Speech recognition engine structure */
00072 struct ast_speech_engine {
00073    /*! Name of speech engine */
00074    char *name;
00075    /*! Set up the speech structure within the engine */
00076    int (*new)(struct ast_speech *speech);
00077    /*! Destroy any data set on the speech structure by the engine */
00078    int (*destroy)(struct ast_speech *speech);
00079    /*! Load a local grammar on the speech structure */
00080    int (*load)(struct ast_speech *speech, char *grammar_name, char *grammar);
00081    /*! Unload a local grammar */
00082    int (*unload)(struct ast_speech *speech, char *grammar_name);
00083    /*! Activate a loaded grammar */
00084    int (*activate)(struct ast_speech *speech, char *grammar_name);
00085    /*! Deactivate a loaded grammar */
00086    int (*deactivate)(struct ast_speech *speech, char *grammar_name);
00087    /*! Write audio to the speech engine */
00088    int (*write)(struct ast_speech *speech, void *data, int len);
00089    /*! Prepare engine to accept audio */
00090    int (*start)(struct ast_speech *speech);
00091    /*! Change an engine specific setting */
00092    int (*change)(struct ast_speech *speech, char *name, const char *value);
00093    /*! Change the type of results we want back */
00094    int (*change_results_type)(struct ast_speech *speech, enum ast_speech_results_type results_type);
00095    /*! Try to get results */
00096    struct ast_speech_result *(*get)(struct ast_speech *speech);
00097    /*! Accepted formats by the engine */
00098    int formats;
00099    AST_LIST_ENTRY(ast_speech_engine) list;
00100 };
00101 
00102 /* Result structure */
00103 struct ast_speech_result {
00104    /*! Recognized text */
00105    char *text;
00106    /*! Result score */
00107    int score;
00108    /*! NBest Alternative number if in NBest results type */
00109    int nbest_num;
00110    /*! Matched grammar */
00111    char *grammar;
00112    /*! List information */
00113    struct ast_speech_result *next;
00114 };
00115 
00116 /*! \brief Activate a grammar on a speech structure */
00117 int ast_speech_grammar_activate(struct ast_speech *speech, char *grammar_name);
00118 /*! \brief Deactivate a grammar on a speech structure */
00119 int ast_speech_grammar_deactivate(struct ast_speech *speech, char *grammar_name);
00120 /*! \brief Load a grammar on a speech structure (not globally) */
00121 int ast_speech_grammar_load(struct ast_speech *speech, char *grammar_name, char *grammar);
00122 /*! \brief Unload a grammar */
00123 int ast_speech_grammar_unload(struct ast_speech *speech, char *grammar_name);
00124 /*! \brief Get speech recognition results */
00125 struct ast_speech_result *ast_speech_results_get(struct ast_speech *speech);
00126 /*! \brief Free a set of results */
00127 int ast_speech_results_free(struct ast_speech_result *result);
00128 /*! \brief Indicate to the speech engine that audio is now going to start being written */
00129 void ast_speech_start(struct ast_speech *speech);
00130 /*! \brief Create a new speech structure */
00131 struct ast_speech *ast_speech_new(char *engine_name, int format);
00132 /*! \brief Destroy a speech structure */
00133 int ast_speech_destroy(struct ast_speech *speech);
00134 /*! \brief Write audio to the speech engine */
00135 int ast_speech_write(struct ast_speech *speech, void *data, int len);
00136 /*! \brief Change an engine specific attribute */
00137 int ast_speech_change(struct ast_speech *speech, char *name, const char *value);
00138 /*! \brief Change the type of results we want */
00139 int ast_speech_change_results_type(struct ast_speech *speech, enum ast_speech_results_type results_type);
00140 /*! \brief Change state of a speech structure */
00141 int ast_speech_change_state(struct ast_speech *speech, int state);
00142 /*! \brief Register a speech recognition engine */
00143 int ast_speech_register(struct ast_speech_engine *engine);
00144 /*! \brief Unregister a speech recognition engine */
00145 int ast_speech_unregister(char *engine_name);
00146 
00147 #if defined(__cplusplus) || defined(c_plusplus)
00148 }
00149 #endif
00150 
00151 #endif /* _ASTERISK_SPEECH_H */
